titles.title: A bill to amend the CARES Act to extend the excise tax holiday period for aviation taxes.
A bill to amend the CARES Act to extend the excise tax holiday period for aviation taxes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill extends the suspension of the imposition of certain aviation taxes until January 1, 2022. Currently, the suspension ends on January 1, 2021.
